name: ShiftyBall
description:
The aim of the game is to move the ball from right to left ,the trick! You can only move in 2D (Left To Right) but any intractable object can move in 3 Dimensions (Forward, Back ,Left and Right). Frustrating game pretty difficult.

Playing around in UE4, Learning the GUI.

CONTROLS

A=Left

D=RIght

W or SPACE = Jump

R=Restart
